cause.description:
first created in 1995 the world trade organization supervised fair trade amongst countries and multinational corporations. today the wto has become bias towards theses rich countries and million dollar corporations. in the beginning the WTO followed thier goal, but now in todays society the rich people and rich countries and rich companies are becoming more and more wealthier and the poor people and smaller countries with less power are suffering even more, world powers such as the usa have grown so big and wealthy that in order to survive they must destroy weaker countries in order to profit off of, "after another 4 years there will be a new president but the same system, a system which will not change but must be broken down by us" - taken from zack de la rocha's speech at coachella
1. to stop the multinational countries and corporations that have plagued our generation and every generation after us
2. just like that trojan condom commercial says, we must spread the knowledge
cause.mission: spread equal opportunities in wealth and every day decisions to everyday people and pulling away from an imperialist government and moving towards a socialist community
cause.name: anti-WTO
